name: The Trouble with Necromancers
description:
The Trouble with Necromancers is a medieval fantasy first person adventure with weapons, monsters, magic and wizards. Evil Necromancers have created  portals to other worlds, bringing monsters, zombies and demons to your realm. you must stop this invasion of evil before it's too late.

(Alpha release demo)

System Requirements:

DX11 Graphics with at least 2gb video ram.

Pentium Dual Core 2Ghz or better w/4gb system ram

7zip or compatible compression software.
